snp4.15:935: "Attadaṇḍā bhayaṁ jātaṁ,janaṁ passatha medhagaṁ;Saṁvegaṁ kittayissāmi,yathā saṁvijitaṁ mayā.
snp4.15:936: Phandamānaṁ pajaṁ disvā,macche appodake yathā;Aññamaññehi byāruddhe,disvā maṁ bhayamāvisi.
snp4.15:937: Samantamasāro loko,disā sabbā sameritā;Icchaṁ bhavanamattano,nāddasāsiṁ anositaṁ.
snp4.15:938: Osāne tveva byāruddhe,Disvā me aratī ahu;Athettha sallamaddakkhiṁ,Duddasaṁ hadayanissitaṁ.
snp4.15:939: Yena sallena otiṇṇo,disā sabbā vidhāvati;Tameva sallamabbuyha,na dhāvati na sīdati.
snp4.15:940: Tattha sikkhānugīyanti,yāni loke gadhitāni;Na tesu pasuto siyā,nibbijjha sabbaso kāme;Sikkhe nibbānamattano.
snp4.15:941: Sacco siyā appagabbho,amāyo rittapesuṇo;Akkodhano lobhapāpaṁ,vevicchaṁ vitare muni.
snp4.15:942: Niddaṁ tandiṁ sahe thīnaṁ,pamādena na saṁvase;Atimāne na tiṭṭheyya,nibbānamanaso naro.
snp4.15:943: Mosavajje na nīyetha,rūpe snehaṁ na kubbaye;Mānañca parijāneyya,sāhasā virato care.
snp4.15:944: Purāṇaṁ nābhinandeyya,Nave khantiṁ na kubbaye;Hiyyamāne na soceyya,Ākāsaṁ na sito siyā.
snp4.15:945: Gedhaṁ brūmi mahoghoti,Ājavaṁ brūmi jappanaṁ;Ārammaṇaṁ pakappanaṁ,Kāmapaṅko duraccayo.
snp4.15:946: Saccā avokkamma muni,Thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo;Sabbaṁ so paṭinissajja,Sa ve santoti vuccati.
snp4.15:947: Sa ve vidvā sa vedagū,Ñatvā dhammaṁ anissito;Sammā so loke iriyāno,Na pihetīdha kassaci.
snp4.15:948: Yodha kāme accatari,Saṅgaṁ loke duraccayaṁ;Na so socati nājjheti,Chinnasoto abandhano.
snp4.15:949: Yaṁ pubbe taṁ visosehi,Pacchā te māhu kiñcanaṁ;Majjhe ce no gahessasi,Upasanto carissasi.
snp4.15:950: Sabbaso nāmarūpasmiṁ,Yassa natthi mamāyitaṁ;Asatā ca na socati,Sa ve loke na jīyati.
snp4.15:951: Yassa natthi idaṁ meti,Paresaṁ vāpi kiñcanaṁ;Mamattaṁ so asaṁvindaṁ,Natthi meti na socati.
snp4.15:952: Aniṭṭhurī ananugiddho,Anejo sabbadhī samo;Tamānisaṁsaṁ pabrūmi,Pucchito avikampinaṁ.
snp4.15:953: Anejassa vijānato,Natthi kāci nisaṅkhati;Virato so viyārabbhā,Khemaṁ passati sabbadhi.
snp4.15:954: Na samesu na omesu,Na ussesu vadate muni;Santo so vītamaccharo,Nādeti na nirassatī"ti.
